name: vsc-codex-bridge
description: VS Code bridge extension that exposes local workspace endpoints for the Codex Hub.

commands.title: VSC Codex Bridge: Auto-detect App-Server Attach URL

vscCodexBridge.hubUrl.description: Base URL of the Codex Hub used for bridge registration and heartbeat.

vscCodexBridge.hubRegisterPath.description: Hub registration path for bridge metadata.

vscCodexBridge.hubHeartbeatPath.description: Hub heartbeat path. Use :bridgeId placeholder in the path.

vscCodexBridge.hubToken.description: Optional Bearer token for Hub API authentication.

vscCodexBridge.backendMode.description: Backend mode used by the bridge. app-server uses real Codex events; simulated uses local mock behavior.

vscCodexBridge.appServerCommand.description: Command used to launch the Codex app-server process.

vscCodexBridge.appServerMode.description: App-server connection mode. spawn launches a local app-server process (recommended). attach attempts to connect to an existing app-server websocket and fails startup if attach cannot be established.

vscCodexBridge.appServerAttachUrl.description: WebSocket URL used when appServerMode=attach (for example ws://127.0.0.1:55545). If empty, bridge attempts best-effort local auto-detection before failing attach startup.

vscCodexBridge.appServerExtraArgs.description: Extra CLI args appended when launching codex app-server.

vscCodexBridge.appServerHost.description: Host interface used when launching app-server with ws://HOST:PORT.

vscCodexBridge.appServerStartupTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds to start and initialize app-server.

vscCodexBridge.appServerExperimentalApi.description: Enable experimental API capabilities during app-server initialize.

vscCodexBridge.bindHost.description: Host interface for the local bridge internal API server.

vscCodexBridge.bindPort.description: Port for bridge internal API server. Use 0 for an ephemeral port.

vscCodexBridge.heartbeatIntervalMs.description: Heartbeat interval in milliseconds for hub updates.

vscCodexBridge.fullAccessAutoApprove.description: When true, full-access mode auto-approves command/file-change approval requests for the active session.

vscCodexBridge.autoStartBridge.description: Automatically start bridge when VS Code window opens this workspace.

vscCodexBridge.verboseLogs.description: Enable verbose bridge logs in the VS Code output panel.
